francesca_de_santis.name: Office
francesca_de_santis.notes: Tranq Franny's guard without her seeing or KO her without a distraction.

francesca_de_santis.name: Mansion Start
francesca_de_santis.notes: Follow the KO combo in the video and shes good to leave here

francesca_de_santis.name: PI Lure
francesca_de_santis.notes: Use an panic or distraction to wake up the PI, he will call franny and then she will come down. The standard ISO intercepts her in kitchen break room.

francesca_de_santis.name: Virus Lure
francesca_de_santis.notes: Destroying the virus will have Franny come down, can be intercepted in the mansion or as she enters the caves

silvio_caruso.name: Observatory
silvio_caruso.notes: Shoot the observatory panel to destroy it and Silvio will respond right away and walk over to check whats wrong

silvio_caruso.name: Cave Lockdown
silvio_caruso.notes: Same as the standard ISO except you will allow him to stare at the telescope and then take out his guards and panic him as he begins to walk towards it

silvio_caruso.name: Dinner Bell
silvio_caruso.notes: Ring the dinner bell to have silvio coemf or dinner. Intercept him in the mansion or poison his plate to have him killable on the cliff.

silvio_caruso.name: Therapy Lure
silvio_caruso.notes: Make Oscar sick to start the mission story trigger, use a panic to shorten is sickness drastically. Around 3-4 mins later he will meet Silvio in a room and both Isolated together.
